author: MJo MacLeod
comment: Like what I see so far; the two faces are lovely. Would like to see more faces, though--not just the day or night either/or. Dawn? Sunset, for starters? Also, definitely, desperately needs ambient mode. Happy to donate to help.
title: More Please.

author: Dylan Staley
comment: The backgrounds in this watchface are quite gorgeous, but the lack of an ambient display mode is a deal breaker for me.
title: Beautiful, but needs work
